structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXXVII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY OLYMPIC EXPLORATORY COMMITTEE

text.section:
Sec. 2-2076. Membership.
The members of the Miami-Dade Sports Commission shall serve as the members of the Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee. Eligibility for membership on the Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee shall be the same as membership for the Miami-Dade Sports Commission, as codified in of the Code of Miami-Dade County.
